channel.title: research on BananaMafia
channel.description: Recent content in research on BananaMafia

item.title: Open Redirects In State Parameters
item.description: Now that the deadline to fix this vulnerability has passed, I've decided to publish this blog post that covers a web vulnerability I've found in the login mechanism of a particular company. Everything started when I had a look at a more complex part of a public web application of this vendor. The web application that gives out a link to the user that can be used to open up the same user state again at a later point.

item.title: r2con 2019 PwnDebian Challenge: Exploiting radare2 (CVE-2019-14745, CVE-2019-16718)
item.description: Hello hello! Everyone knows: This years r2con, the conference about radare2, has a very special challenge – PwnDebian: The almighty blenk92 and me decided to assist the radare2 project in finding such an exploit an we think we were quite successful :) But first some basics for r2. Shelling Out Via The r2 Shell While running r2, it's possible to shell out and execute shell commands without leaving the r2 console:
